summary:
26. Welcomes the appointment of a civilian Head of Mission for UNISFA and encourages close communication and coordination.

27. Requests the Secretary-General to report on progress in implementing UNISFA's mandate by May 1 and June 15, 2015.

28. Notes the Secretary-General's efforts to ensure close cooperation among UN missions in the region and requests him to continue this practice.

29. Decides to remain actively seized of this matter.
